key.name: wallpaper-no-windows
key.summary: Wallpaper URI when no visible windows are open
key.description: The file URI for the wallpaper to use when no visible windows are open.

key.name: wallpaper-with-windows
key.summary: Wallpaper URI when visible windows are open
key.description: The file URI for the wallpaper to use when one or more visible windows are open.
